text: There was a house that was raided by rats. A cat found out and went to her, and little by little she was eating the rats. But they, seeing that they were quickly hunted, decided to hide in their holes. The cat couldn't catch them, so he devised a trap to get them out. He climbed a beam, and hanging from it, he became dead. And one of the rats looked up, and saw him, and said to him, Behold, my friend, though thou were a sack of flour, I would not come near thee. Beware of the tricks of those who want to hurt you.
title: El gato y las ratas
author: nan Esopo
